/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, characterized by their curved roofs and ornate facades. These buildings are adorned with red and gold accents, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. The street itself is mostly empty, with only a few cars and pedestrians visible, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
